extractedText: Mohammed Yaseen  6301994353   |   myaseen2402@gmail.com   |   https://github.com/yaseen2402  Education  University College of Engineering, Osmania University   Hyderabad  Master of Engineering in Artificial Intelligence and Machine Learning   Oct. 2024 – Present  Nawab Shah Alam Khan College of Engineering and Technology   Hyderabad  Bachelor of Engineering in Computer Science and Engineering [CGPA: 8.02/10]   Aug. 2020 – July 2024  Experience  Python Developer Intern   June 2023 – October 2023  InI Labs  •   Collaborated with the Data Curation Team to clean, validate, and structure raw data.  •   Developed and enhanced Python scripts to convert unstructured raw text into organized HTML-tagged data, improving data accessibility and usability for downstream applications.  •   Optimized existing Python code for faster processing, reducing execution time and improving efficiency.  Projects  Optimizing LLMs for Code Quality and Accuracy   |   Python, PyTorch, Unsloth, QLoRA, PEFT, TRL, Modal  •   Fine-tuned Qwen 2.5 Coder 32B open-source Large Language Model using QLoRA on a curated set of high-difficulty coding tasks, leveraging LIMA principles for alignment.  •   Achieved 3.35% absolute pass@1 improvement on BigCodeBench-Hard benchmark, closing performance gap with proprietary models.  •   Improved model-generated code quality, with outputs featuring richer docstrings, cleaner modular structure, robust error handling, and thorough input validation.  •   Designed and executed a resource-efficient training pipeline on a single H100 GPU using Unsloth, QLoRA, BitsAndBytes, and Modal  LawRAG: AI-Powered Legal Research System   |   Python, LangChain, SentenceTransformers, ChromaDB, Docker  •   Designed and implemented a Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG) system to answer legal questions using Australian Supreme Court case data.  •   Built a full pipeline with legal document preprocessing, chunk-level embedding, semantic retrieval via ChromaDB, and context-aware answer generation using Gemini.  •   Compared multiple sentence embedding models (MPNet, BGE-Large, GTE-Large) for retrieval effectiveness, analyzing their impact on answer faithfulness, relevance, and contextual grounding.  •   Developed a custom legal QA evaluation dataset and assessed system performance using RAGAS and BERTScore.  •   Deployed the system using Docker for modular, reproducible experimentation and scalable component management.  Imagio - AI Stories Generator   |   FastAPI, Flutter, Firebase, GCP  •   Built and deployed a generative AI mobile app that enables users to create images, comics, and webtoon-style visual stories, supported by a built-in prompt-designer for crafting higher-quality prompts.  •   Integrated Gemini for image generation through a FastAPI backend, with a dedicated worker service for long-running tasks.  •   Deployed the backend on Google Cloud Run, and used Firebase Authentication, Firestore, and Cloud Storage to manage user accounts, image metadata, content records, and media assets.  •   Published on the Play Store, reaching more than 1700 organic downloads and 500 monthly active users.  Technical Skills  Languages : Java, Python, C, JavaScript, SQL  ML/AI Frameworks : PyTorch, Unsloth, LangChain  Web and Mobile Frameworks : React, Express, FastAPI, Flutter  Developer Tools : Git, GitHub, Docker  Cloud Platforms : Google Cloud Platform (GCP) and Amazon Web Services (AWS)

Imagio - AI Stories Generator   |   FastAPI, Flutter, Firebase, GCP  •   Built and deployed a generative AI mobile app that enables users to create images, comics, and webtoon-style visual stories, supported by a built-in prompt-designer for crafting higher-quality prompts.  •   Integrated Gemini for image generation through a FastAPI backend, with a dedicated worker service for long-running tasks.  •   Deployed the backend on Google Cloud Run, and used Firebase Authentication, Firestore, and Cloud Storage to manage user accounts, image metadata, content records, and media assets.  •   Published on the Play Store, reaching more than 1700 organic downloads and 500 monthly active users.
